name: Dwarf Balls
description:
Enter the colorful world of Dwarf Balls!

Save the ball from the obstacles by moving it and not falling into the void.

MULTIPLAYER MODE:

- Play with players across the globe!

- Race against players and win the matches!

- Play on various challenging maps and win the rounds.

- Win each round in a total of 3 Rounds and get ranked by winning the final round of the race!

- Get rewarded based on rounds completed!

CAREER

EPISODES: Episodes contains colorful fun Stages up to 10. 

Complete different Stages based on increasing difficulties.

Collect enough stars in each Episode to unlock the new Episode!

POWER-UPS

Use power-ups to boost your gameplay.

ENDLESS MODE

Roll on the endless path and score as best you can!

Endless comes in three modes: Easy, Medium, and Hard mode. The score will increase after passing every layer of Obstacles. Compete with other players through your score! Rank up on the leaderboard by increasing your score!

CUSTOMIZATION

Buy cool stylish balls with Coins and Customize them by painting them with patterns.

FEATURES IN SHORT

- Singleplayer / Multiplayer

- Race with others and win rounds!

- Cloud Saving

- Challenging Stages and maps!

- Grow your Career by completing Stages!

- Customizable Ball!

- Stunning Graphics!

- Power-ups to boost!

- Endless Runner!

- Endless mode comes in three difficulties: Easy, Medium, and Hard!

- Score as best as you can on each of the endless modes.

- Leaderboard in Endless Mode to rank your score up from other players!
